name: Mayro's Schoolhouse Of Fun
description:
Welcome to Mario's Schoolhouse of Fun!

An educational piece of software that teaches kids, and even adults, simple math! Collect all 8 mathbooks to win, It won't be easy though, As Mayro wants you to answer his 4 questions of simple math, Like subtraction and even addition! Come on in and play this enjoyable wacky world experience today!

(Game inspired by Baldi's Basics and more based on Sonic's Schoolhouse)
